text: Wangen an der Aare is a municipality in Oberaargau in the canton of Bern in Switzerland. Since 2024, Wangenried became a part of Wangen an der Aare. ==Gallery== File:Wangen che Aro aerbildo 090.JPG|Wangen an der Aare File:Wangen-an-der-Aare-Gemeindehaus.jpg|Municipality house of Wangen an der Aare File:2011-11-30-Mezlando (Foto Dietrich Michael Weidmann) 066.JPG|Castle Wangen an der Aare ==References== ==Other websites== * Official Website of the city of Wangen an der Aare Category:Municipalities in Oberaargau Category:Cities in Switzerland
title: Wangen an der Aare
